com.ibm.aglet.message
Interface MessageManager

All Known Subinterfaces:
MessageManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageManagerImpl
public interface MessageManager

The MessageManager controls concurrency of incomming message. Each kind of message can have a priority and will be placed in the message queue in accordance with its priority.

Version:
1.30 $Date: 2009/07/28 07:04:53 $
Author:
Mitsuru Oshima
See Also:
FutureReply, ReplySet

Field Detail

NOT_QUEUED

static final int NOT_QUEUED
Used as a argugment to the setPriority. It indicates that messages which have the same kind will not be queued in the message queue and processed immediately.

See Also:
setPriority(java.lang.String, int), Constant Field Values

ACTIVATE_AGLET

static final int ACTIVATE_AGLET
Used as a logical OR in the priority. It indicates that receiving this kind of messages will automatically activate the aglet if it had been deactivated. 
 getMessageManager().setPriority("wakeMeUp", NORM_PRIORITY | ACTIVATE_AGLET);

See Also:
setPriority(java.lang.String, int), Constant Field Values

MIN_PRIORITY

static final int MIN_PRIORITY
The minimal priority that the message can have.

See Also:
setPriority(java.lang.String, int), Constant Field Values

NORM_PRIORITY

static final int NORM_PRIORITY
The default priority that is assigned to a message.

See Also:
setPriority(java.lang.String, int), Constant Field Values

MAX_PRIORITY

static final int MAX_PRIORITY
The maximum priority that the message can have.

See Also:
setPriority(java.lang.String, int), Constant Field Values
Method Detail

destroy

void destroy()
Destorys the manager. After this calling, the message manager is no longer valid and all queued and incoming message will be denied.

exitMonitor

void exitMonitor()
Exits the current monitor.

See Also:
Aglet.exitMonitor(), Aglet.waitMessage(), Aglet.notifyMessage(), Aglet.notifyAllMessages()

notifyAllMessages

void notifyAllMessages()
Notifies all of waiting threads.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalMonitorStateException - If the current thread is not the owner of the monitor.
See Also:
Aglet.notifyAllMessages(), Aglet.waitMessage(), Aglet.notifyMessage()

notifyMessage

void notifyMessage()
Notifies a single waiting thread.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalMonitorStateException - If the current thread is not the owner of the monitor.
See Also:
Aglet.notifyMessage(), Aglet.waitMessage(), Aglet.notifyAllMessages()

setPriority

void setPriority(java.lang.String kind,
                 int priority)
Sets the message's priority.

Parameters:
kind - the kind to set a priority
priority - the priority

waitMessage

void waitMessage()
Waits until it is notified.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalMonitorStateException - If the current thread is not the owner of the monitor.
See Also:
Aglet.notifyMessage(), Aglet.notifyAllMessages()

waitMessage

void waitMessage(long timeout)
Waits until it is notified or the timeout expires.

Parameters:
timeout - the maximum time to wait in milliseconds.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalMonitorStateException - If the current thread is not the owner of the monitor.
See Also:
Aglet.waitMessage(), Aglet.notifyMessage(), Aglet.notifyAllMessages()
